document_data.name: Intan Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Intan Mountains''' were a large range of mountains in [[Kara-Tur]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: The Intan Mountains were bordered in the south by the deep jungles of [[Malatra]], the nation of [[Petan]] to the north, and by the forests of [[Tertava]] in the north. These set of mountains were south of the several clustered towns and lakes.
